* This abstract class provides boilerplate parameters list. $Id: AbstractParameterizable.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $ 3.0
* List of the parameters names.
<declaration type="Collection" name="parametersNames" />
* Simple constructor. names names of the supported parameters
* Simple constructor. names names of the supported parameters
* {@inheritDoc}
<method type="Collection" name="getParametersNames" startLine="52" endLine="54" />
* {@inheritDoc}
* Check if a parameter is supported and throw an IllegalArgumentException if not. name name of the parameter to check UnknownParameterException if the parameter is not supported #isSupported(String)
